scripts.test: npx hardhat test test/domain/** test/access/** test/protocol/**.js test/protocol/clients/** --parallel
scripts.test:gas-reporter: npx hardhat test test/domain/** test/access/** test/protocol/**.js test/protocol/clients/**
scripts.check:scripts: eslint test/** scripts/** '*.js' && prettier --list-different test/** scripts/** '*.js'
scripts.docgen: npx truffle compile --contracts_directory contracts/interfaces && npx truffle compile --contracts_directory contracts/domain && rm -rf contract_docs && npx solidoc && rm -rf build
scripts.tidy:scripts: eslint --fix test/** scripts/** '*.js' && prettier --write test/** scripts/** '*.js'
scripts.coverage: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat coverage --testfiles '{test/access/*.js,test/protocol/*.js,test/protocol/clients/*.js}'
scripts.deploy-suite: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat deploy-suite --network ${NETWORK:-hardhat} --env ${ENV:-''} >> logs/${NETWORK:-hardhat}-${ENV:-''}.deploy.contracts.txt
scripts.deploy-mocks: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat deploy-mock-nft-auth --network ${NETWORK:-hardhat}
scripts.migrate: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat migrate $VERSION --network ${NETWORK:-hardhat} --env ${ENV:-''} >> logs/${NETWORK:-hardhat}-${ENV:-''}.migrate.contracts.txt
scripts.estimate-limits: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat estimate-limits
